title: $:/plugins/kookma/search
name: Search in Fields
description: Advanced search in fields using regular expression and tabular output
author: Mohammad Rahmani
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/config/Search/exclude-fields":{"title":"$:/config/Search/exclude-fields","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"text"},"$:/config/Search/live-preview":{"title":"$:/config/Search/live-preview","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki"},"$:/config/Search/primary-fields":{"title":"$:/config/Search/primary-fields","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"title tags text caption"},"$:/config/Search/search-scope":{"title":"$:/config/Search/search-scope","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"[all[tiddlers]!is[system]]"},"$:/config/Search/tabular-columns":{"title":"$:/config/Search/tabular-columns","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"tbl-expand title tags created"},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/history","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"Full change log https://kookma.github.io/TW-Search/#ChangeLog * ''0.7.0'' -- 2022.01.13 -- stable release with better UI * ''0.1.0'' -- 2022.01.04 -- beta public release "},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/images/regex.svg":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/images/regex.svg","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":""},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/images/table":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/images/table","caption":"table","collection":"","library":"Bootstrap","library_version":"1.3.0","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":""},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/license":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/license","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"Distributed under an MIT license. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. <<<"},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/macros/definition":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/macros/definition","tags":"$:/tags/Search/Macro","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define searchTid() $:/temp/advancedsearch/input \define optionTid() $:/config/search-in-fields/option \define sFieldsTid() $:/config/search-in-fields/selected-fields \define searchScopeTid() $:/config/Search/search-scope \define primaryfieldsTid() $:/config/Search/primary-fields \define excludefieldsTid() $:/config/Search/exclude-fields \define columnsTid() $:/config/Search/tabular-columns \define livepreviewTid() $:/config/Search/live-preview \define searchScope() [subfilter{$(searchScopeTid)$}] -[[$(searchTid)$]] \define allFields() $(searchScope)$+[fields[]sort[title]] -[subfilter{$(excludefieldsTid)$}] \define selectedFields() [[$(sFieldsTid)$]indexes[]sort[title]]"},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/patterns/date-range":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/patterns/date-range","description":"Date range","pattern":"(^2019090|^2019091[0-5])","tags":"$:/tags/Search/Pattern","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"Find all tiddlers created on date range 1st to 15th September, 2019 ;Pattern : `(^2019090|^2019091[0-5])` ;Explanation : `(|)` a capturing group. The `|` acts like a boolean OR. Matches the expression before or after the `|`. : `^` asserts position at start of the string : `2019090` matches characters 2019090 literally :: this returns any tiddler created in 2019, 09 (September). The next `0` stands for day number so it matchs 01 to 09 (the only day numbers with leading zero) : The `|` acts like a boolean OR. Matches the expression before or after the `|`. : `^` asserts position at start of the string : `2019091` matches characters 2019091 literally :: this returns any tiddler created in 2019, 09 (September). The next `1` stands for day number so it matchs and day number started with `1` : `[0-5]` match a single character present in the list below [0-5]. `[]` is a character set (character class) :: 0-5 a single character in the range between 0 (index 48) and 5 (index 53) (case sensitive)"},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/patterns/end-with-number":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/patterns/end-with-number","description":"Ending with numbers","pattern":"\d+$","tags":"$:/tags/Search/Pattern","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"!! Match Lines Ending with Numbers The numbers at the end of the line can be matched by using $ in the regex. The $ sign is used to express end of the line. The following regex can be used to match numbers at the end of the line. ``` \d+$ ``` or ``` \[0-9]+$ ```"},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/patterns/not-containing-string":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/patterns/not-containing-string","description":"Match not containing string","pattern":"^((?!badword).)*$","tags":"$:/tags/Search/Pattern","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"!! Match string not containing string Given a list of strings (words or other characters), only return the strings that do not match. Ref: https://www.regextester.com/15"},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/patterns/only-lowercase-letters":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/patterns/only-lowercase-letters","description":"Only lowercase letters","pattern":"^[a-z]+$","tags":"$:/tags/Search/Pattern","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"; Pattern : `^[a-z]+$` ; Explanation : `^` asserts position at start of the string : `[a-z]` matches a single character in the range between a and z (case sensitive) : `+` matches one or more repetitions of preceeding symbol (here lowercase characters) : `$` asserts position at end of the string"},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/patterns/only-numbers":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/patterns/only-numbers","description":"Match only numbers","pattern":"^\d+$","tags":"$:/tags/Search/Pattern","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":";Match Only Number Lines :In some cases we may need to match lines those only consist of numbers. These lines do not contains non-numeric characters. The ^ and $ are used to set start and end of line which consist of only numbers. ``` ^\d+$ ``` or ``` ^[0-9]+$ ```"},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/patterns/start-with-number":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/patterns/start-with-number","description":"Starting with numbers","pattern":"^\d+","tags":"$:/tags/Search/Pattern","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"!! Match Lines Starting with Numbers The numbers can be located at the start of the line. These numbers can be matched by using the `^` sign which is used to express the start of the line. ``` ^\d+ ``` or ``` ^\[0-9]+ ```"},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/readme","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"; Search Advanced search in fields, lets search in any fields with standard method or regular expressions. ;Code and demo For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages * Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Search/ * Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Search "},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/styles/main":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/styles/main","text":".tc-advanced-search input[type=radio] { width: auto; } .tc-advanced-search input[type=checkbox] { width: auto; } /* .tc-advanced-search-check input { width:auto; } */ .kk-search-input { width:50%; min-width:240px; } /* fields drop down */ .kk-search-dropdown { max-height:calc(100vh - 2.5em); overflow-y:auto; } .kk-search-dropdown input{ width:auto; margin-left:20px; } /* field seclection */ .kk-search-label{ font-weight:bold; font-size: 0.9em; padding-left:6px; padding-right:6px; display:flex; justify-content:space-between; } .kk-search-label .tc-btn-invisible{ opacity:0.4; } .kk-search-label:hover .tc-btn-invisible{ opacity:1; } .kk-search-label .tc-btn-invisible svg{ width: 1em; height: 1em; } /* Tabular output */ .kk-search-tubular{ max-width: 100%; overflow-x: auto; }","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css"},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/AdvancedSearch/Fields":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/AdvancedSearch/Fields","caption":"Fields","list-before":"$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter","tags":"$:/tags/AdvancedSearch","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"{{$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/inputs}}"},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/ControlPanel/Settings":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/ControlPanel/Settings","caption":"Search in Fields","list-after":"$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/TiddlyWiki","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/SettingsTab $:/tags/MoreSideBar","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Search/Macro]] These settings let you customise the behaviour of Search in Fields plugin. --- ;Show Search setting in more sidebar :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/ControlPanel/Settings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in more sidebar ; Enable Search in fields :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/AdvancedSearch/Fields" tag="$:/tags/AdvancedSearch"> Enable Search in $:/AdvancedSearch ;Options :<$edit-text tiddler=<> field="text" tag=input defualt="" placeholder="enter a valid filter " class="kk-search-input"/> <$button tooltip="restore default" class="tc-btn-invisible" actions="""<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/>""">{{$:/core/images/refresh-button}} :<$edit-text tiddler=<> field="text" tag=input defualt="" placeholder="enter field name, e.g fld01 [[field two]] " class="kk-search-input"/> <$button tooltip="restore default" class="tc-btn-invisible" actions="""<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/>""">{{$:/core/images/refresh-button}} :<$edit-text tiddler=<> field="text" tag=input defualt="" placeholder="enter field name, e.g fld01 [[field two]] " class="kk-search-input"/> <$button tooltip="restore default" class="tc-btn-invisible" actions="""<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/>""">{{$:/core/images/refresh-button}} :<$edit-text tiddler=<> field="text" tag=input defualt="" placeholder="enter columns(fields) name" class="kk-search-input"/> <$button tooltip="restore default" class="tc-btn-invisible" actions="""<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/>""">{{$:/core/images/refresh-button}} ; Enable live preview :<$checkbox tiddler=<> field="text" checked="yes"> Enable live field preview in plain output "},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/fields-selection":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/fields-selection","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Search/Macro]] \whitespace trim \define clearfields(filter) <$list filter="[indexes[]] :intersection[subfilter<__filter__>] +[limit[1]] [!match[yes]] +[count[]compare:integer:gteq[2]]" variable=ignore> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Uncheck selected fields"> {{$:/core/images/close-all-button}} <$list filter=<<__filter__>> variable=fieldname> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> \end <$vars disabledStatus={{{ [get[allfld-status]match[all]then[yes]] [is[missing]then[yes]] }}} > <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="select a search filter"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="belowleft" animate="yes" class="tc-popup-keep" tag=div> <$set name="tv-show-missing-links" value="yes">
Primary fields <$macrocall $name=clearfields filter="[get[text]enlist-input[]]" />
<$list filter="[get[text]enlist-input[]]" variable=fieldname> <$checkbox tiddler=<> index=<> checked="x" disabled=<> > <$text text=<>/>
Other fields <$macrocall $name=clearfields filter="[subfilter] -[get[text]enlist-input[]]" />
<$checkbox tiddler=<> field="allfld-status" checked="all" unchecked="" default="all"> *all -[excluded]
<$list filter="[subfilter] -[get[text]enlist-input[]]" variable=fieldname> <$checkbox tiddler=<> index=<> checked="x" disabled=<> > <$text text=<>/>
"},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/inputs":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/inputs","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Search/Macro]] \whitespace trim Search in fields...  <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/options" mode=inline />
<$edit-text tiddler=<> field=text type=search tag=input default='' placeholder='search terms' refreshTitle="$:/temp/advancedsearch/refresh" focus={{$:/config/Search/AutoFocus}} inputActions='<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" text={{{ [get[text]] }}}/>' /> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/fields-selection" /> <$list filter="[get[search-mode]match[regexp]]" variable=ignore> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/pattern-selection" /> <$reveal stateTitle=<> stateField=text type=nomatch text=''> <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz]!is[missing]] :filter[lookup:no[$:/config/Plugins/Disabled/]match[no]]" variable=ignore> <$button class=tc-btn-invisible tooltip="toggle tubular/plain format"> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="format" $subfilter="+[toggle[tabular]]" /> {{$:/plugins/kookma/search/images/table}} <$button class=tc-btn-invisible tooltip="clear search box"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=text $value=''/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/results" mode=block/>
"},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/options":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/options","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Search/Macro]] <$checkbox field="case-sensitive" tiddler=<> checked="casesensitive" disabled={{{[get[search-mode]match[regexp]then[yes]]}}}> case sensitive  <$radio field="search-mode" tiddler=<> value="words" default="words"> words   <$radio field="search-mode" tiddler=<> value="literal"> literal  <$radio field="search-mode" tiddler=<> value="regexp"> regexp   "},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/pattern-selection":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/pattern-selection","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Search/Macro]] <$button popup=<> class=tc-btn-invisible tooltip="select a regex pattern"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/search/images/regex.svg}} <$reveal state=<> type=popup position=belowleft animate=yes> <$set name="tv-show-missing-links" value="yes"> <$linkcatcher actions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" text=<>/><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch/input" text=<>/><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch/refresh" text="yes"/><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param='.tc-advanced-search input' />""">
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Search/Pattern]sort[description]]"><$link to={{!!pattern}}><$transclude field=description/>
"},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/results":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/ui/results","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Search/Macro]] \define field-search(field) <$let regexpFilter = """[subfilterregexp:$field$]""" normalFilter = """[subfiltersearch:$field$:$(flag-list)$]""" searchFilter = {{{ [match[regexp]thenelse] }}} matches = {{{[subfiltercount[]]}}} resultformat = {{{ [get[format]] }}} tableCosl = {{{[get[text]]}}} pagingStat = {{{ [compare:integer:gt[25]then[yes]else[no]] }}} > <$list filter="""[subfilterlimit[1]]""" > <$reveal default=<> type=match text='tabular' tag=div class="kk-search-tubular"> $field$ (<$text text=<>/>) <$macrocall $name=table-dynamic filter=<> fields=<> class="w-100" editButton="no" pagination=<> stateTiddler="advancedsearch/$field$" /> <$reveal default=<> type=nomatch text='tabular'>
$field$ (<$text text=<>/>)
<$list filter=<> >
get[text]match[yes]then{!!$field$}] }}}><$link/>
\end <$let selectedFields = {{{ [!is[missing]thenelse] }}} fields-filter = {{{ [get[allfld-status]match[all]thenelse] }}} casesensitive = {{{ [get[case-sensitive]] }}} search-mode = {{{ [get[search-mode]] :else[[words]]}}} flag-list = {{{ [] [] +[!is[blank]join[,]] }}} search-terms = {{{ [get[text]else[]] }}} filterMinLength = {{$:/config/Search/MinLength}} > <$list filter="[minlengthlimit[1]]" emptyMessage={{{ [!is[blank]then[Search term is too short]] }}} variable=ignore>
<$list filter="[subfilter]" variable=field> <$macrocall $name=field-search field=<> />
"}}}
